data.text: @TheAnneEvanoff @TheAce_Cleo @Kl_Locke @nytimes Not really. Conservatives actually had more votes. Trudeau squeaked past the post first. A bigger percent of people didn’t vote at all because none of are any different.

@PpcWhy @TheAce_Cleo @Kl_Locke @nytimes We did vote! In September!
Most Canadians must want this government. Hm. I guess I DON’T know everything.

@nytimes -
This is nothing more than politicians and the biased media that agree with them losing control of the people.

They must be bad, they must be far right, they must be extremist if they don’t think we know what’s best for them.

People are waking up, there will be a reckoning.
@Kl_Locke @TheAce_Cleo @nytimes The great politicians reset. Get rid of them all and everyone vote #ppc2022

@WrongThinkMike @nytimes "Far Right" - the most overused, fear mongering term of the last 2 years. Right used to just mean less government/fiscal responsibility. The left now uses it to brainwash sheep that it's a bunch of racist thugs looking to overthrow government. Sheep can't tell the difference.
@Kl_Locke @TheAce_Cleo @nytimes You hit the nail right on the head.
